title: The Writer's Almanac - Tuesday, March 23, 2021
description: Today in 1877 writer Josef Čapek was born. Josef invented the word “robot” for a play he wrote about mass-produced human substitutes who are employed as cheap labor.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Today in 1877 writer Josef Čapek was born. Josef invented the word “robot” for a play he wrote about mass-produced human substitutes who are employed as cheap labor.
